hadiths.text: It was narrated that Umm Fadl said:that the Messenger of Allah said: “Breastfeeding once or twice, or suckling once or twice, does not make (marriage) unlawful.”

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ تُحَرِّمُ الْمَصَّةُ وَلاَ الْمَصَّتَانِ
chapter.eng-name: Sucking once or twice does not make (marriage) unlawful
